categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Veag Gonwa was a Jedi Knight who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. Around 3638 BBY, Gonwa was part of Strike Team Oricon, a unit sent to the moon of Oricon to confront the powerful rogue Sith known as the Dread Masters. A male Zabrak with a brown ponytail, gray eyes, and tan skin with brown tattoos on his face, Gonwa wore the dark gray armor with orange and white markings that most of the strike team wore. Gonwa sold armor and weaponry, and he often practiced with his green lightsaber using training remotes at their camp.

An armor vendor for the Jedi Knight class on Oricon, Gonwa was introduced on October 1, 2013, in Game Update 2.4 for the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel. Gonwa and the rest of the class gear vendors at Oricon, along with all other Daily Areas and high-level planets, were replaced by standardized vendors in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015; Gonwa was replaced by Master Vikto.
